page.title: 09 T.S. Swiftsure
page.content: T.S. Swiftsure was opened in 1974. T.S.stands for{Training Ship.}It is like a youth organisation for boys and girls. The meetings are every Monday and Friday and Thursday for band.There are nights that are used for boat pulling too. There are five different ranks to progress through before you become an officer. Before you get your uniform you are a New Entry then you become a Junior Cadet, an Ordinary Seaman, an Able Seaman, a Leading Cadet and at last a Petty Officer. Before going onto each rank you have to pass a test on all the things you have learnt in that rank. The sea cadets also go on camps or ships like T.S. Aberdovey and in the Summer we go on Summer camp to Jersey.
